titleStmt.title: Nevves from Southampton, or The copie of a letter to Captain Thomas Harrison in London from Mr. Peter Murford, Serjeant Major to Colonell Norton, discovering a late plot of the cavaleering hoptonians against the said towne of Southampton: but by the mercy of God (and the fidelity of the said major) prevented. Also herein is related the distressed condition of that county as it now stands. Published according to order.
titleStmt.author: Murford, Peter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Overton in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: the 4 in imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1643; "feb: 13th".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
